I.lead: The station Stein-Säckingen between Basel SBB - Brugg AG / Laufenburg, no train services are operating.
I.text:
The station Stein-Säckingen between Basel SBB - Brugg AG / Laufenburg, no train services are operating.

Trains IR Basel SBB - Zürich HB are cancelled between Basel SBB and Frick.

Trains S1 Basel SBB - Frick are cancelled between Mumpf and Frick.

Trains S 2 Basel SBB - Laufenburg are cancelled between Mumpf and Laufenburg.

The trains IR Basel SBB - Zürich Flughafen are being rerouted.
The trains IR Basel SBB - Zürich Flughafen do not stop in Rheinfelden + Frick.

Replacement bus services are operating Mumpf - Stein-Säckingen - Frick.
Replacement bus services are operating Stein-Säckingen - Laufenburg.

Please allow for a longer travelling time.

Passengers travelling from Basel SBB to Zürich HB via Olten.

Reason: derailment.

Duration of interruption indefinite.

AttributeVariant.Text: BICYCLES: No self-service loading by sender

I.lead: A replacement service will be operating on time for the train ICE 70 from Chur departure 12:39 to Hamburg-Altona arrival 21:53.
I.text:
A replacement service will be operating on time between Chur and Basel SBB for the train ICE 70 from Chur departure 12:39 via Landquart 12:49 - Zürich HB 14:00 - Basel SBB 15:06 - Basel Bad Bf 15:15 - Freiburg (Breisgau) Hbf 15:49 - Baden-Baden 16:34 - Karlsruhe Hbf 16:51 - Mannheim Hbf 17:16 - Frankfurt (Main) Hbf 17:58 to Hamburg-Altona arrival 21:53.

Passengers travelling from Chur - Zürich HB to Basel Bad Bf - Hamburg-Altona change in Basel SBB.

Reason: Change in the carriages used
